name: Bytedance
description: ByteDance offers content platforms that enable people to enjoy content powered by AI technology. ByteDance operates a dozen products accessible all over the world including TikTok, Vigo, Toutiao, TopBuzz and more.

name: Stripe
description: Stripe is an online-based, payment processing platform that gives online merchants the ability to securely accept credit card payments through the use of custom-built forms.

name: SpaceX
description: SpaceX designs, manufactures and launches advanced rockets and spacecraft. SpaceX also develops a low latency, broadband internet system to meet the needs of consumers across the globe, known as Starlink.

name: Didi Chuxing
description: Didi Chuxing is a multi-modal transportation platform. The company offers a full range of app-based transportation options including taxi, express, premier, luxe, bus, designated driving, enterprise solutions, bike sharing, e-bike sharing, car sharing, and food delivery. It was formed by the merger of Kuaidi Dache and DiDi Dache.

name: Klarna
description: Klarna offers safe and easy-to-use payment solutions to e-stores. At the core of Klarna's services is the concept of after-delivery payment, allowing buyers to receive ordered goods before any payment is due. At the same time, Klarna assumes all credit and fraud risk for e-stores.
